infos.value: Come to think of it, King Oelde spoke with you before we departed, right? What did His Majesty want?
"No matter what may happen, take back Leonis's rightful territory." That's all he said...
He meant after we drive back the Fennes forces...right, Lord Mont?
Of course. Father seems to be thinking of what lies ahead.
There is something hidden within Leonis that must remain undisturbed.
I can't tell you how many times I heard such a tale growing up.
Something hidden... What do you think it could be?
I haven't the faintest. But Father said that it is the guardian's duty to safeguard it...
Even this ring, with its power to call forth visions... It seems Gilgamesh bequeathed it so the guardian could fulfill their duty.
Or perhaps so that one could shoulder the burden of that role...
The guardian, huh... What could Gilgamesh possibly be trying to have us protect...?
